name: Florida man generator
description:
A game referring to the well known "Florida man myth", where people from Florida commit the most absurd and weird crimes, such as "Police arrest Florida man for drunken joy ride on motorized scooter at Wal-Mart".

This game is in development. It may receive updates soon.

DESCRIPTION:
Sentences like the news articles are generated randomly from given words as soon as you click.

Disclaimer:
None of the sentences that this software generates are serious. They are meant as a joke and not to be understood as the reality. If you feel offended, please contact me.

Email address: marco911porsche@gmail.com
